channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Waste collection issues & request for additional bins at 3 Henry Road, N4 2LH, 9th December
item.description:
I live at 3 Henry Road, N4 2LH and have experienced repeated problems with waste collection services. After bin collections, the bin-collection team frequently leave loose rubbish, bin residue, or litter scattered on the pavement and street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Henry Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 9th December
item.description:
Fly tipping near the junction of Brodrick Grove and Blithdale Rd. Despite there being a camera focused on the fly tipping for at least 2 years the fly tipping continues on a regular weekly basis. Is the camera switched on? Who is looking at the footage? The Council are clearing the fly tipping at least every 2 weeks but is anyone looking at camera footage?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping all down Ossory Road on both sides, 9th December
item.description:
Excessive fly tipping is occurring. Someone is entering the gates of the abandoned buildings and leaving rubbish in the area behind the gates. There is now also stacks of fly tipping in many locations on the street in 3-4 locations as well as next to Asda goods entrance. I have multiple pictures but can only attach a few to show. There needs to be a big clean up of the entire road from start all the way downâ€¦.,bring a large truck

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ossory Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Torriano Avenue, at junction with Camden Road, 9th December
item.description:
Last night, Lime and Forest scooters/bikes were parked in the cycle bay, residents bay and electric vehicle bay. This often happens. Its usual for them to be parked in the cycle bay and the residents bay. I cant walk very far, so the residents bay is important to me. What is the council doing about limiting the number of bikes that are parked there ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201 - 203, Camden Road, Tufnell Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped tiles into recycling bin, 9th December
item.description:
Black Mercedes Van -Vehicle Registration -SM56 DXJ parked close to the recycling bins by Coptefield Drive and filled up the paper / card recycling bins with old ceramic tiles on 16 November 2025 at 13.45.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coptefield Drive, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
